transcripts.text: Local journalism is an increasingly essential pillar of our work at Detroit Public TV.  Our weekly shows, One Detroit and American Black Journal, share the authentic stories of our community like no other news source.  And now our ability to provide the community with balanced local and national journalism will expand with the new five-year commitment from the Cynthia and Edsel Ford Fund for Journalism.  Join Cynthia Netzel Ford in advancing local and trusted journalism with your financial support to help match their $40,000 challenge grant at dptv.org slash journalism.
